item.title: A red meat allergy caused by ticks killed a N.J. man. Here's what to know
item.description: Researchers say they believe they've documented the first known death from alpha-gal syndrome â€” a red meat allergy caused by tick bites.

item.title: A stock of U.S.-bought birth control, meant for sub-Saharan Africa, goes bad in Belgium

item.title: As funding falters, young brain scientists rethink careers in research
item.description: Research on brain disorders may slow as young neuroscientists struggle to find jobs and research grants.

item.title: Young brain researchers ponder other careers amid federal funding cuts
item.description: Cuts and disruptions to federal research funding are causing many young brain scientists to reconsider their career choice.
